00035         struct _BoxDimensions
00036         {
00037                 OpenViBE::float32 width; 
00038                 OpenViBE::float32 height; 
00039                 OpenViBE::float32 x; 
00040                 OpenViBE::float32 y; 
00041                 OpenViBE::float32 depth; 
00046                 _BoxDimensions& operator=(const OpenViBE::float32& a) 
00047                 { 
00048                         this->x=a; this->y=a; this->width=a; this->depth=a; this->height=a;
00049                         return *this; 
00050                 }
00051                 
00055                 bool operator==(const OpenViBE::float32& b) 
00056                 {
00057                         if (this->width==b && this->height==b && this->x==b && this->y==b && this->depth==b)
00058                                 return true;
00059                         else
00060                                 return false;
00061                 }
00062                 
00066                 bool operator!=(const _BoxDimensions& b) 
00067                 {
00068                         if (this->width!=b.width || this->height!=b.height || this->x!=b.x || this->y!=b.y || this->depth!=b.depth)
00069                                 return true;
00070                         else
00071                                 return false;
00072                 }               
00073                         
00074         };
